sentences.english: The basic factor that led to the disintegration of the Southern Tang Dynasty's Fangzhen system was the strategy of stabilization.
sentences.chinese: 決定南唐方鎮體制崩解的根本因素是安定戰略。

sentences.english: The third chapter related to Content Analysis of Nan-tang history books.
sentences.chinese: 第三章主要對宋人南唐史著內容進行分析。

sentences.english: Southern Tang Regime also promotes the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms ultimately to the historical process of reunification.
sentences.chinese: 南唐也推動了五代十國最終走向統一的歷史進程。

sentences.english: Boating on the river, you will fully appreciate the "Southern Tang state building" in the history of heavy.
sentences.chinese: 泛舟河上，您會充分領略到“州建南唐”的歷史厚重。

sentences.english: Gu Hongzhong's Han Xizai Evening Banquet is one of the masterpieces of Southern Tang Dynasty painting.
sentences.chinese: 畫卷中的主人公是南唐中書侍郎韓熙載。

sentences.english: Li Yu, the emperor of Southern Tang Dynasty, in his poems many contented "wind."
sentences.chinese: 南唐後主李煜，在他寫的詞中也頗多“風”。
